data.title: Police Department
data.meta_description: The Police Department and its officers work hard to serve and protect the community. Here you can find helpful information about their initiatives, divisions, and more.
data.text:
SWAT Situation in North Abilene

ABILENE, TX – On Wednesday, August 14, 2024, just after 9 p.m., Abilene Police were called to the 2700 block of Old Anson Road in North Abilene for the report of a person who had been shot. Read on...

Officer Involved Shooting Investigation

ABILENE, TX – On Thursday, August 1, 2024, around 6:30 p.m., police responded to a domestic disturbance call at a home located in the 3800 block of North Ninth Street in north Abilene. Read on...

APD K9 Awards and Newest K9 Team

ABILENE, TX – The Abilene Police Department K9 officers earned several awards at the United States Police Canine Association Region 25 certifications earlier this summer held in Wichita Falls, TX. Read on...

Chief Seratte Reacts to Death of Homicide Suspect

The Abilene Police Department has recently learned of the death of Billye Brown on July 27, 2024, a suspect in an ongoing murder investigation. Read on...

Big Country Man Arrested on Child Pornography Charges

ABILENE, TX – On Wednesday, July 18, 2024, the Abilene Police Department Cyber Crimes, with the assistance of the Anson Police Department, Homeland Security Investigations, and the Texas Rangers, arrested 55-year-old Daril Gonzales of Anson Read on...

Two Citizens Deceased in Apparent Murder/Suicide

ABILENE, TX – On Wednesday, July 17, 2024, just before 2 a.m., police were called to a home in the 5200 block of South 7th St. to the report of an injured subject. Read on...

Barricaded Subject/Officer Involved Shooting

Abilene, Texas – On July 2, 2024, at approximately 2:12 p.m., officers were dispatched to the corner of South 7th and Alameda Street for a disturbance in progress. Read on...

Fatal Crash Investigation - West Lake Road

ABILENE, TX – An Abilene man has passed away from injuries sustained in a single-vehicle crash just before noon on Tuesday, June 18, 2024. Read on...

Former Private School Employee Arrested on Child Pornography Charges to be in Federal Court

ABILENE, TX – The former Abilene Private School 27-year-old employee charged with Possession of Child Pornography and Possession of Child Pornography with Intent to Deliver will be in Federal Court for a detention hearing. Read on...

Possible Child Abduction Update

ABILENE, TX – On Wednesday, June 6, a mother called police, reporting two people in a vehicle had approached her young child while he was outside playing. The mother thought that a male & female had possibly attempted to lure her child into their vehicle. Read on...

Pedestrian Hit by Train Killed

ABILENE, TX – on Friday, June 7, 2024, just before 10:30 a.m., police dispatch received a call of a pedestrian that was hit by a train along north and south first streets near the Leggett Street crossover. Read on...

Loop 322 Double Fatal Crash Investigation

ABILENE, TX – Abilene Police Traffic Investigators were called out to Loop 322 near the Highway 80 overpass on Thursday, June 6, 2024, just before 4:30 p.m., regarding a traffic collision between two vehicles. Read on...

Arrest Made in Aggravated Assault at Park

ABILENE, TX – Abilene Police arrested a 26-year-old Abilene man for allegedly shooting at a mother and son at an Abilene park on Sunday, June 2, 2024. Read on...

New APD Guardian Program & Reporting Crime Online

ABILENE, TX – In an effort to enhance community safety and ensure the wellbeing of our vulnerable populations, the Abilene Police Department is proud to announce the launch of the Guardian Program. Read on...

APD Promotion Ceremony

ABILENE, TX – The Abilene Police Department will host a promotion ceremony at the Abilene Police Department, 4565 South First, on Wednesday, May 22, 2024, at 6 p.m. in the main conference room. Read on...

Fatal Crash Investigation Involving Multiple Vehicles

Abilene, Texas – On Saturday, May 18, 2024, at around 12:15 p.m., police responded to a multi-vehicle crash in the 3200 block of South Danville Street. Read on...

Abilene Man Arrested for Child Pornography

Abilene, Texas – Abilene Police Department detectives with the Cyber Crimes Unit arrested a 27-year-old Abilene man with one count of Possession of Child Pornography & one count of Possession of Child Pornography with Intent to Promote Child Pornography. Read on...

Abilene Man Charged with Murder in Fentanyl Overdose

ABILENE, TX – The Abilene Police Department Narcotics Unit, with the assistance of the Taylor County District Attorney’s Office, charged a 49-year-old Abilene man with First Degree Felony Murder and Class A Possession of a Controlled Substance. Read on...

Suspect in New Mexico Multiple Murders & Child Abduction Arrested in Abilene

ABILENE, TX – On Sunday, May 5, 2024, the Federal Bureau of Investigations notified Abilene Police that a suspect wanted in Clovis, New Mexico, for the Homicide of two individuals, injuring a 5-year-old, and abducting an infant may be in Abilene. Read on...

Officer Involved Shooting Investigation

ABILENE, TX – On Monday, May 6, 2024, at around 2 p.m., police were called out to the United Supermarket at 920 North Willis. Read on...

Officer Involved Shooting

ABILENE, TX – On Monday, April 29, 2024, just before 9 p.m., officers were called out to a discharge of weapon call in the 1000 block of Grape Street in north Abilene. The reporting party stated that a female had discharged a weapon... Read on...

Female Injured in North Abilene Shooting, Suspect in Custody

ABILENE, TX – On Wednesday, April 24, 2024, at 1:30 a.m., police were called out to an injured subject to an apartment complex in the 3000 block of West Lake Rd. in north Abilene. Read on...

Abilene Police Department Names Third Assistant Chief

ABILENE, TX – The Abilene Police Department announces the promotion of Joel Harris to Assistant Chief of Police. Read on...

Motorcycle Safety Course

ABILENE, TX – The Abilene Police Department Motor officers are holding a motorcycle safety course for citizens in the Abilene area. Read on...

School Threat Arrest

Abilene, Texas – On Monday, April 1, 2024, the Abilene Police Department and the Abilene Independent School District was made aware of a threat to Abilene High School students and teachers via a social media post. Read on...

Suspect in Multiple Robberies Arrested

ABILENE, TX – On Sunday, March 31, 2024, police were dispatched to an aggravated robbery at an apartment complex located in the 5200 block of Hartford Street. Read on...

Fatal Motorcycle Crash Investigation

ABILENE, TX – An Abilene woman died from injuries sustained in a single motorcycle just after midnight on Saturday, March 30, 2024. Read on...

Police Searching for Suspect in Two Overnight Convenience Store Incidents

ABILENE, TX – Abilene Police detectives with Major Investigations are looking for a suspect in a convenience store robbery, and one attempt occurred overnight. Read on...

Abilene Man Arrested on Child Pornography Charge

ABILENE, TX – On Thursday, March 21, 2024, the Abilene Police Department arrested 26-year-old Daniel Munoz of Abilene on one count of Second Degree Felony Possession of Child Pornography with Intent to Promote. Read on...

Homicide Investigation in South Abilene - Arrest

ABILENE, TX – On Thursday, March 7, 2024, at 3:22 p.m. Police were dispatched to a home located in the 4300 block of Mary Lou Lane in south Abilene for a report of an injured subject involving a shooting. Read on...

Operation Janus Nets 47 Arrests Involving Crimes against Children Including One Abilene Man

ABILENE, TX – The Abilene Police Department Cyber Crimes assisted in a multi-agency operation across the State which resulted in several arrests, including an Abilene male, 20-year-old Adrian Alvarez Dominguez. Read on...

Fatal Pedestrian Hit-and-Run Investigation

ABILENE, TX – A 59-year-old Abilene man is deceased after being hit by two vehicles. Donan Myron Justice was in his wheelchair in the intersection of Highway 351 and the entrance to the Walmart when a vehicle traveling east hit him and fled the scene. Read on...

Abilene Police Impound Auction Notice of Public Sale of Abandoned Vehicles

ABILENE, TX – Notice is hereby given that at on March 4, 2024, the City of Abilene will hold a public auction via the renebates.com website. Read on...

17 Arrested in Large Scale Drug Bust

ABILENE, TX – The Abilene Police Department Narcotics Division assisted in the arrest of 17 area males and females who were alleged drug dealers and charged following a large-scale drug bust in Abilene... Read on...

UPDATE: Fatal Pedestrian Crash Investigation Arrest

Abilene, Texas – On Wednesday, February 21, 2024, Abilene Police arrested 28-year-old Gabriella Lujan, of Hawley TX, and charged her with Second Degree Felony Accident Involving Death and Failure to Stop and Render Aid. Read on...

Fatal Motorcycle Crash Investigation

Abilene, Texas – On Tuesday, February 20, 2024, just before noon, the Abilene Police Department responded to a major vehicle collision involving a motorcycle, in the 4300 block of Pine Street in north Abilene. Read on...

Fatal Pedestrian Crash Investigation

Abilene, Texas – On Friday, February 16, 2024, at 9:40 p.m. the Abilene Police Department responded to a major vehicle collision involving a vehicle and a pedestrian, in the 3100 block of Pine Street in north Abilene. Read on...
